name: The Sleeper's Eclipse
description:
(Zoom-in for crispness) "The sleeper turns their back on everyone". Another one the illustrations I made during COVID-19's quarantine. This one represents the sleeper on the burning cusp of awakening. The eclipse in wich their very souls will burn away the hazy clouds of depression, even if it's little by little. "The sleeper must awaken."

Made with:

- 280gsm Canson Paper
- Watercolor paint
- Nankin pens
- Pain
